```{r HTML, include=FALSE}
## some frequently used HTML expressions
# use lowercase here because these tend to be variable names in the examples
zc <- "<i>Z</i><sub>C</sub>"
nh2o <- "<i>n</i><sub>H<sub>2</sub>O</sub>"
```

This vignette from the R package JMDplots contains plots from the paper by Dick et al. (2019) (preprint).

```{r JMDplots, message = FALSE, results = "hide"}
library(JMDplots)
```

## Basis species comparison (Figure 1)
```{r gradH2O1, message = FALSE, echo = 1, fig.align='center', out.width='100%', out.height='370px'}
gradH2O1(TRUE)
knitr::include_graphics("gradH2O1.pdf")
```

## `r zc` for selected redox gradients (Figure 2)
```{r gradH2O2, message = FALSE, echo = 1, fig.align='center', out.width='100%', out.height='300px'}
gradH2O2(TRUE)
knitr::include_graphics("gradH2O2.pdf")
```

## `r nh2o`-`r zc` scatterplots for redox gradients and the Baltic Sea (Figure 3)
```{r gradH2O3, message = FALSE, echo = 1, fig.align='center', out.width='100%', out.height='350px'}
gradH2O3(TRUE)
knitr::include_graphics("gradH2O3.pdf")
```
